hasDitaContent.@value: Tetracycline increases the anticoagulant effect of acenocoumarol. Manufacturer advises monitor INR.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Tetracycline   increases   the anticoagulant effect of   acenocoumarol .  Manufacturer advises monitor INR .

hasDitaContent.@value: Acitretin increases the risk of benign intracranial hypertension when given with tetracycline. Manufacturer advises avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Acitretin   increases   the risk of benign intracranial hypertension when given with   tetracycline .  Manufacturer advises avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both tetracycline and alcohol can increase the risk of hepatotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  tetracycline  and  alcohol  can increase the risk of hepatotoxicity.

hasDitaContent.@value: Both tetracycline and alectinib can increase the risk of hepatotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  tetracycline  and  alectinib  can increase the risk of hepatotoxicity.

hasDitaContent.@value: Alitretinoin increases the risk of benign intracranial hypertension when given with tetracycline. Manufacturer advises avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Alitretinoin   increases   the risk of benign intracranial hypertension when given with   tetracycline .  Manufacturer advises avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Oral antacids greatly decrease the absorption of oral tetracycline. Manufacturer advises separate administration by 2 to 3 hours.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Oral   antacids   greatly   decrease   the absorption of   oral   tetracycline .  Manufacturer advises separate administration by 2 to 3 hours .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both tetracycline and asparaginase can increase the risk of hepatotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  tetracycline  and  atorvastatin  can increase the risk of hepatotoxicity.

hasDitaContent.@value: Tetracycline decreases the concentration of atovaquone. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Tetracycline   decreases   the concentration of   atovaquone .  Manufacturer advises caution .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both tetracycline and bedaquiline can increase the risk of hepatotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  tetracycline  and  bedaquiline  can increase the risk of hepatotoxicity.

hasDitaContent.@value: Bismuth greatly decreases the efficacy of tetracycline. Manufacturer advises separate administration by 2 hours.
